net.sf.jclal.util.sort

Class OrderUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.sf.jclal.util.sort.OrderUtils

  • public class OrderUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class that implements a collection of ordering algorithms.
    Author:
    Oscar Gabriel Reyes Pupo, Eduardo Perez Perdomo

      • maxIndex

                           int begin,
                           int end)
        Parameters:
        doubles - The array to order
        begin - Index where start the algorithm, inclusive.
        end - Index where end the algorithm, exclusive.
        Returns:
        The max index

      • mergeSort

        public static void mergeSort(java.util.List<Container> array,
                             boolean descendentOrder)
        MergeSort algorithm. O(NlogN) This implementation uses internally the merge sort implementation of the JVM
        Parameters:
        array - The array to order
        descendentOrder - True if the array will be ordered in descendent order, false otherwise

      • quickSort

        public static void quickSort(java.util.List<Container> array,
                             boolean descendentOrder)
        QuickSort algorithm. O(NlogN). This is an implementation of the classic Hoare version of the quick sort algorithm
        Parameters:
        array - The array to order
        descendentOrder - True if the array will be ordered in descendent order, false otherwise

        Parameters:
        array - An array
        i - The i-th element to swap
        j - The j-th element to swap

      • burbleSort

        public static void burbleSort(java.util.List<Container> array,
                              boolean descendentOrder)
        BurbleSort algorithm. O(N^2)
        Parameters:
        array - The array to order
        descendentOrder - True if the array will be ordered in descendent order, false otherwise

        InsertionSort algorithm. O(N^2)
        Parameters:
        array - The array to order
        descendentOrder - True if the array will be ordered in descendent order, false otherwise
